overview: The film begins with a "Dog of Andalusia" style image. I don't mind if it's an imitation of Godard. The film begins with the words "I don't care if it's an imitation of Godard", and then a series of images that seem to imitate some film appear and disappear one after another. The film is interrupted by a sceptical narration, which pauses to describe the artist's anguish at not knowing how to end the film, even though he wants to. A light, self-assertive film that pretends to be a film imitation.
title: END, END
